casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

October, 1977

(October 28, 1977) Dan Pearson, Respondent, v Alfreda W. Slominski, Individually and as Comptroller of the County of Erie, Appellant.

Judgment unanimously affirmed, without costs, on the opinion at Special Term, Doerr, J. (Appeal from judgment of Erie Supreme Court—art 78.) Present—Moule, J. P., Cardamone, Simons, Hancock and Denman, JJ.
